name: HMAccessoryDelegate
desc: A set of methods that defines the communication method for state updates from accessories to their delegates.

items.name: func accessoryDidUpdateName(HMAccessory)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when the name of the accessory is updated.

items.name: func accessoryDidUpdateReachability(HMAccessory)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when the reachability of the accessory changes.

items.name: func accessoryDidUpdateServices(HMAccessory)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when the services on the accessory have been updated.

items.name: func accessory(HMAccessory, didUpdateNameFor: HMService)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when the name of a service is updated.

items.name: func accessory(HMAccessory, service: HMService, didUpdateValueFor: HMCharacteristic)
items.desc: Informs the delegate of a change in value of a characteristic.

items.name: func accessory(HMAccessory, didUpdateAssociatedServiceTypeFor: HMService)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when the associated service type of a service is modified.

items.name: func accessory(HMAccessory, didAdd: HMAccessoryProfile)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when a profile is added to an accessory.

items.name: func accessory(HMAccessory, didRemove: HMAccessoryProfile)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when a profile is removed from an accessory.

items.name: func accessory(HMAccessory, didUpdateFirmwareVersion: String)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when firmwareVersion has been changed for an accessory.
